title: How long does it take to answer a question sent to My Reporter and are all questions answered?
text:
Our goal is to answer questions within five business days after
they've been asked. That doesn't always happen for various reasons,
such as the inability to reach a source or breaking news that might
involve the reporter assigned to answer the question.



We endeavor to answer most questions, either through reporting or
through links to previously answered questions or stories. 



The focus of MyReporter.com is answering questions about life in
Coastal North Carolina. That's where we devote our resources.
